import axios from"axios";export class HttpClient{constructor(){this.baseURL=void 0;this.client=void 0;this.baseURL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASEURL;this.client=axios.create({baseURL:this.baseURL,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},withCredentials:true});}async axiosFetch(url,options){let{body,method,headers}=options;// 요청에 보낼 정보들
let req={url,method,data:body,headers:{...headers}};try{let res=await this.client(req);return res.data;}catch(err){throw err;}}}
